title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 208.4 - Denials and appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 208.4 - Denials and appeals

State Regulations
(a) Denial of
access to records shall be in writing stating the reason therefor and advising
the requester of the right to appeal to the individual established to determine
appeals, who shall be identified by name, title, business address and business
phone number. (b) Appeals may be
taken in accordance with section
89
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
208.4

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
